definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw near, approach, less freq. syn. of [[קרב]] q.v. (NH id. Hiph. (rare) and deriv.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: :68 Impf. [[יִגַּשׁ]] Ex 24:14 +, [[יִגׇּ֑שׁ]] Ps 91:7, [[וַיִּגַּשׁ]] Ge 18:23 +; 3 fs. [[וַתִּגַּשׁ]] Ge 33:7; 2 ms. [[תִּגַּשׁ־]] Is 65:5; 3 mpl. [[יִגְּשׁוּ]] Is 41:1 +, [[יִגׇּ֑שׁוּ]] Ex 24:2, [[יִגַּ֑שׁוּ]] Job 41:8 (Baer; van d. H. [[יִנׇּ֑שׁוּ]]); 3 fpl. [[וַתִּגַּשְׁןָ]] Ge 33:6, etc.; Imv. [[גַּשׁ]] 2Sa 1:15, [[גֶּשׁ־]] Ge 19:9, [[גְּשָׁה]] Ge 27:21 + 2 t.; fs. [[גְּשִׁי]]; Ru 2:14, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[לָגֶ֫שֶׁת]] Ju Jdg 20:23 +; sf. [[גִּשְׁתּוֹ]] Ge 33:3; [[גִּשְׁתָּם]] Ex 28:43 + 2 t.;—draw or come near, 1. human subj.: sq. [[אֶל־]] pers. Ge 27:22, Ge 43:19, Ge 44:18, Ge 45:4 (all J), Ex 19:15 (of sexual intercourse), Ex 24:2, Nu 32:16, Jos 14:6 (all E), Ex 34:30, Jos 21:1 (P), + 10 t. elsewhere (not D), + Ps 91:7 (subj. pestilence personif.); of priestly approach to ´[[י]] Ez Eze 44:13, cf. Je 30:21, also sq. [[אֶל־]] of altar Ex 28:43, Ex 30:20, Le 21:23 and abs., v:2l (all P or H); sq. [[אֶל־]] rei also Nu 8:16; sq. [[עַד־]] pers. Ge 33:3 (J), rei Ju Jdg 9:52; sq. [[עַל־]] pers. Ez Eze 9:6, rei Eze 44:13; sq. [[בְּ]] pers. Is 65:5 (‖[[קָרַב אֶל־]]); in Am 9:10 rd. [[תִּגַּשׁ בַעֲדֵנוּ]] (for MT [[תַּגִּישׁ]] Hiph. cf. We GASm Dr Now; ‖[[קִדֵּם]]); sq. [[לַמִּלְחָמָה]] draw near for battle Ju Jdg 20:23, Je 46:3, 2Sa 10:13 = 1Ch 19:14 (+ [[לִפְנֵי]] pers.); sq. acc. of pers. 1Sa 9:18, 1Sa 30:21, rei Nu 4:19 (P), but acc. difficult; Dr rds. [[אֶל־]] for [[אֶת־]] 1Sa 9:18, Nu 4:19, cf. Klo HPS; in 1Sa 30:21 Dr takes [[אֶת־]] = with; sq. [[הֲלוֹם]] hither, 1Sa 14:38, Ru 2:14; abs. Ge 18:23, Ge 27:21, Ge 29:10, Ge 33:6, Ge 33:7, Ge 45:4 (all J), Ex 24:2 (E), Jos 8:11 (E; + [[ויבאו]]), + 9 t. (not P, D),+ Ge 27:26, Ge 27:27 (E), Jos 3:9 (J), 2Sa 1:15, 2Ch 29:31 (all Imv. sq. 2nd Imv.), + Ge 19:9 (J), Le 21:21, Le 21:21 (H), 2Ki 4:27 (all sq. Inf. purpose); Note esp. [[גֶּשׁ־הָ֫לְאָה]] Ge 19:9 lit approach thither! i.e. move away ! cf. [[גְּשָׁה־לִי וְאֵשָׁבָה]] Is 46:20 move away for me (make room for me that I may dwell (‖[[חַר־לִי הַמָּקוֹם ]]).
inanim. subj. [[בְּאֶחָד יִגַּ֫שׁוּ אֶחָד]] Job 41:8 one to another they approach (fit closely together; of scales of crocodile ).—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (and substit. for it in D):—sq. [[אֶל־]] pers. De 25:9, 1Ki 20:13, Ezr 9:1, of priestly approach to Yahweh Ex 19:22 (J), Je 30:21; sq. [[אֶל־]] rei Ex 20:21, Ex 24:2 (both E), 2Sa 11:20, 2Sa 11:21, [[אֶל־הַמִּשְׁפָּט]] De 25:1; sq. [[בְּ]] pers. Am 9:13; sq. [[לַמִּלְחָמָה]] 1Sa 7:10; abs. Ge 33:7 (J), De 20:2 (‖[[קרב]]), De 21:5, Ex 34:32 (P), so fig. of worship Is 29:13.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. consec. [[וְהִגִּישׁוֹ]] Ex 21:6, Ex 21:6, [[וְהִגִּישָׁהּ]] Le 2:8; 3 pl. [[הִגִּ֫ישׁוּ]] 2Sa 17:29; 2 mpl. [[הִגַּשְׁתֶּם]] Am 5:25; Impf. juss. [[יַגֵּשׁ]]Job 40:19; [[וַיַגֶּשׁ־]] Ge 27:25; [[וַיַּגַָּשׁ]] Ju Jdg 6:19; 3 fs. [[תַּגִּישׁ]] Am 9:10, [[וַתַּגֵּשׁ]] 1Sa 28:25, 2Sa 13:11; 3 mpl. [[יַגִּ֫ישׁוּ]] Is 41:22; 2 mpl. [[תַּגִּ֫ישׁוּ]] Mal 1:8, [[תַּגִּישׁוּן]] v:Mal 1:8, [[וַתַּגִּישׁוּן]] Am 6:3, etc.; Imv. ms. [[הַגִּ֫ישָׁה]] Ge 27:25 +; mpl. [[הַגִּ֫ישׁוּ]] 1Sa 13:9 +; Pt. [[מַגִּישׁ]] Mal 2:12; pl. cstr. [[מַגִּישֵׁי]] Mal 3:3, etc.;—cause to approach, bring near, bring, sq. [[אֶל־]] pers. (usu. obj. acc. rei, rarely pers. Ex 21:6, Ex 21:6, 1Sa 15:32, Ge 48:10 cf.v:Ge 48:13):—Ge 48:10, Ge 48:13 (E), Ex 21:6, Ex 21:6 (E), 1Sa 13:9, 1Sa 14:34, 1Sa 15:32, 2Sa 13:11 (+ Inf. purpose), 2Ki 4:5, 2Ki 4:6; sq. [[אֶל־הַמִּוְבֵּךְַ]] Le 2:8 (P; of sacrifice); [[עַל־זְבְּחִי]] Mal 1:7 (sacrif.); [[לְ]] pers. Ge 27:25, Ge 27:25 (E), 1Sa 30:7, 2Sa 17:29 (rd. [[וַיַּגִּישׁוּ]] LXX Th We Klo Kit, cf. Dr), of sacrifice Am 5:25, Mal 2:12, Mal 3:3; [[לִפְנֵי]] pers. 1Sa 28:25, 2Ch 29:23; no prep. Ex 32:6 (J), 1Sa 14:18, 1Sa 14:34, 1Sa 23:9, 1Sa 30:7, Ju Jdg 6:19 (foll. [[הוחיא אֶל־]]), Am 6:3, 1Ki 5:1, Le 8:14 (P), of sacrif. also Mal 1:8 ([[לִזְבּׂחַ]]), v:Mal 1:8 (‖[[הקריב]]); fig. (obj. proofs, evidences) Is 41:21 (‖[[קרב]]), v:Is 41:22 (+ [[וַיַּגִּידוּ]]), cf. Is 45:21 (‖[[הַגִּידוּ]]); [[הָעשׁׂוֹ יַגֵּשׁ חַרְבּוֹ]] Job 40:19 let him that made him (the hippot.) draw near his sword, is dub.; Du [[נׁגֵשׂ חֲבֵרָו]] [[[י]]][[הֶעָשׂוּ]] wh. is made ruler of its fellows (other conject. v. Di Bu); Am 9:10 rd. [[תִּגַּשׁ]]

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[לאׂ־לִנְחֻשְׁתַּיִם הֻגַָּשׁוּ]] 2Sa 3:34 (Ginsb [[הֻגׇּ֫שׁוּ]] thy feet have not been brought near (put into) fetters; Pt [[מֻגׇּשׁ לשׁמי]] Mal 1:11 it (impers.) is offered to my name. †

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Imv. mpl. [[הִתְנַגְּשׁוּ]] Is 45:20 draw near! (‖[[הִקָּֽבְחוּ יׇבׂאוּ]]).
